thread.title: Urumbukal...thrills Vinay Forrt as well!
thread.title_full: Urumbukal...thrills Vinay Forrt as well! - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: Urumbukal...thrills Vinay Forrt as well!
text:
From his initial films to the much liked Premam, Vinay Forrt has managed to carve out a niche for himself in the Malayalam film industry.
His portrayal of quirky characters grabbed the limelight the most; for instance, the 'Java sir' in Premam .
In a recent interview, the actor said that he is extremely happy about the response he has been getting for his latest film, Urumbukal Urangarilla . Apparently, the actor too enjoyed the movie as one among the audience, when he watched it recently. He added that Chemban Vinod's performance in the movie was outstanding.
